Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Location Near St. Peter's Square”

Reviews.Content: wife stayed 5 nights midjanuary 2011 short rome vacation loved location leaving morning returning evening walking route st peters square beautiful 510 minutes hotel quiet comfortable clean private bath plain ok rome continental breads cereals cheese excellent strong coffee guests stay breakfast indicate busier summer definitely stay
